roy-etal-2022-towards.title: Towards Few-Shot Identification of Morality Frames using In-Context Learning
roy-etal-2022-towards.author:
Roy, Shamik  and
Nakshatri, Nishanth Sridhar  and
Goldwasser, Dan
roy-etal-2022-towards.paperMotivationText: Due to the data scarcity in NLP problems related to nuanced socio-linguistic concepts, few-shot identification of these concepts is desirable.
roy-etal-2022-towards.paperContributionText: The authors investigate few-shot identification of Morality Frames using LLMs.
roy-etal-2022-towards.paperResultsText: They find that the LLMs' performance is below that of a fine-tuned RoBERTa model, but surpasses it with few-shot in-context learning.
roy-etal-2022-towards.resourcesOtherText: Johnson and Goldwasser (2018), Morality Frames (Roy et al., 2021)
